'''Radiant Spincrystal 130''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Harmonious Capitolium]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

<!--Location description-->It is located beneath the golden aqueduct in [[Alta Semita]], near a [[Xenochromatic Creature|Xenochromatic Blubberbeast]] and [[Echoing Conch]], on a rock next to some bulbous blue plants.
